    21  type SelfSigned struct {
    22  	Reader io.Reader
    23  	CaDER  CertificateDER // der: Distinguished Encoding Rules is a binary format
    24  	KeyPair
    25  }

    29  //func NewCertificateAuthority()
    30  func NewSelfSigned(canonicalName string) (ca CertificateAuthority) {
    31  
    32  	// get private key
    33  	var keyPair KeyPair
    34  	var err error
    35  	if keyPair, err = NewEd25519(); err != nil {
    36  		panic(err)
    37  	}
    38  
    39  	//  reate certificate authority
    40  	c := SelfSigned{Reader: rand.Reader, KeyPair: keyPair}
    41  
    42  	// sign self-signed ca certificate
    43  	cert := &x509.Certificate{}
    44  	EnsureSelfSigned(cert)
    45  	signer := c.Private()
    46  	if c.CaDER, err = x509.CreateCertificate(rand.Reader, cert, cert, signer.Public(), signer); err != nil {
    47  		panic(error116.Errorf("x509.CreateCertificate ca: '%w'", err))
    48  	}
    49  	ca = &c
    50  	return
    51  }

    53  const (
    54  	/*
    55  		NoPassword       PasswordType = "\tnoPassword"
    56  		GeneratePassword PasswordType = "\tgeneratePassword"
    57  		GenerateOnTheFly Strategy     = iota << 0
    58  		UseFileSystem
    59  		DefaultStrategy = GenerateOnTheFly
    60  	*/
    61  	DefaultCountry  = "US"
    62  	notAfterYears   = 10
    63  	caSubjectSuffix = "ca"
    64  )

    66  func (ca *SelfSigned) Sign(template *x509.Certificate, publicKey crypto.PublicKey) (certDER CertificateDER, err error) {
    67  
    68  	// get certificate authority x509.Certificate
    69  	var isValid bool
    70  	var caCert *x509.Certificate
    71  	if isValid, caCert, err = ca.Check(); err != nil {
    72  		return
    73  	} else if !isValid {
    74  		err = error116.New("Self-Signed Certiicate Auhtority not valid")
    75  		return
    76  	}
    77  	caSigner := ca.KeyPair.Private()
    78  
    79  	// sign template
    80  	if certDER, err = x509.CreateCertificate(ca.Reader, template, caCert, publicKey, caSigner); err != nil {
    81  		err = error116.Errorf("x509.CreateCertificate: '%w'", err)
    82  		return
    83  	}
    84  	return
    85  }
    86  
    87  func (ca *SelfSigned) Check() (isValid bool, cert *x509.Certificate, err error) {
    88  	if !ca.HasKey() || !ca.HasDER() {
    89  		return
    90  	}
    91  	var c x509Certificate
    92  	if c.Certificate, err = x509.ParseCertificate(ca.CaDER); err != nil {
    93  		err = error116.Errorf("x509.ParseCertificate: '%w'", err)
    94  		return
    95  	}
    96  	isValid = c.HasPublic()
    97  	cert = c.Certificate
    98  	return
    99  }

   101  func EnsureTemplate(cert *x509.Certificate) {
   102  	if cert.SerialNumber == nil {
   103  		cert.SerialNumber = big.NewInt(1)
   104  	}
   105  	if len(cert.Subject.Country) == 0 {
   106  		cert.Subject.Country = []string{DefaultCountry}
   107  	}
   108  	if cert.Subject.CommonName == "" {
   109  		if host, err := os.Hostname(); err != nil {
   110  			panic(error116.Errorf("os.Hostname: '%w'", err))
   111  		} else {
   112  			if index := strings.Index(host, "."); index != -1 {
   113  				host = host[:index]
   114  			}
   115  			cert.Subject.CommonName = host
   116  		}
   117  	}
   118  	if cert.NotBefore.IsZero() {
   119  		nowUTC := time.Now().UTC()
   120  		year, month, day := nowUTC.Date()
   121  		cert.NotBefore = time.Date(year, month, day, 0, 0, 0, 0, nowUTC.Location())
   122  	}
   123  	if cert.NotAfter.IsZero() {
   124  		notBeforeUTC := cert.NotBefore.UTC()
   125  		year, month, day := notBeforeUTC.Date()
   126  		cert.NotAfter = time.Date(year+notAfterYears, month, day, 0, 0, -1, 0, notBeforeUTC.Location())
   127  	}
   128  	cert.BasicConstraintsValid = true
   129  }
   130  
   131  func EnsureSelfSigned(cert *x509.Certificate) {
   132  	if cert.Issuer.CommonName == "" {
   133  		if host, err := os.Hostname(); err != nil {
   134  			panic(error116.Errorf("os.Hostname: '%w'", err))
   135  		} else {
   136  			if index := strings.Index(host, "."); index != -1 {
   137  				host = host[:index]
   138  			}
   139  			cert.Issuer.CommonName = host + caSubjectSuffix
   140  		}
   141  	}
   142  	if len(cert.Issuer.Country) == 0 {
   143  		cert.Issuer.Country = []string{DefaultCountry}
   144  	}
   145  	if len(cert.Subject.Country) == 0 {
   146  		cert.Subject = cert.Issuer
   147  	}
   148  	cert.IsCA = true
   149  	cert.KeyUsage = x509.KeyUsageCertSign | x509.KeyUsageCRLSign
   150  	EnsureTemplate(cert)
   151  }
   152  
   153  func EnsureServer(cert *x509.Certificate) {
   154  	EnsureTemplate(cert)
   155  	cert.KeyUsage = x509.KeyUsageDigitalSignature
   156  	cert.ExtKeyUsage = []x509.ExtKeyUsage{x509.ExtKeyUsageServerAuth}
   157  }
   158  
   159  func EnsureClient(cert *x509.Certificate) {
   160  	EnsureTemplate(cert)
   161  	cert.KeyUsage = x509.KeyUsageDigitalSignature
   162  	cert.ExtKeyUsage = []x509.ExtKeyUsage{x509.ExtKeyUsageClientAuth}
   163  }
